page.title: 08BELLINGHAM SHOW.
page.content: Bellingham Show takes place each year on the last Saturday in August. It is an agricultural show and includes a country fair. Classes are for horses,sheep,goats,dogs and hounds. At 7 o'clock I get up,muck out my pony and make sure he is all right for the big day.By 9.30 we have arrived at the show field which is all ready busy.My sister competes in the handy pony class,her first ever competition.She does not win but says it's taking part that matters.At one o'clock we take part in the fancy dress competition dressed up as Zorro and a clown,and we both win commended tickets.At about half past three the mounted pony sports begin and we take part and thoroughly enjoy ourselves.We go home tired but happy at the end of a very busy day.
